name: Safa
description:
Safa is a 3rd person puzzle-platforming game, created by a team of students as part of their final year project. 

The game might have some kinks to be found, but we have tried our best to iron those out, so please be nice (:

On top of that, some friendly advice; Use an Xbox controller for the best gameplay experience, otherwise when the game starts press the "K" key to switch to mouse/keyboard controls

The "P" button takes you to the menu if you do not have a controller, and "SPACE" is used in the menu along with the ARROW keys to navigate the menu

Enjoy! (:
